       LinkedHashMap<String,MessageHeader> messageHeaders,
       Entity entity)
        Protected constructor.
        Parameters:
        connection - - The connection f which the message was received.
        requestLine - - A representation of the first line in the request message (the message method, URI, and protocol version).
        messageHeaders - - A collection of request message headers.
        entity - - The message entity or payload. May be null.
